heading: Data Scientist
text:
Summary roleData scientists work closely business stakeholders understand goals determine data can used achieve goals. design data modeling processes, create algorithms predictive models extract data business needs, help analyze data share insights peers.data analysts typically work structured data solve tangible business problems, data scientists often deal unknown using advanced data techniques make predictions future. role generally considered advanced version data analyst.SalaryAccording Indeed, average salary data scientist $141,059 per year United States.
Also according Glassdoor, estimated total pay data scientist $120,206 per year United States area, base pay $99,548 plus $20,657 additional pay. Additional pay include cash bonus, commission, tips, profit sharing. total pay ranges 90K 172K.Preferred SkillsBS/MS quantitative field (Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics, Analytics, Data Science)Proficient data analysis tools programming languages SQL, Python RExperience building visualizations (using Tableau/Qlik Sense/Excel/R/Python/tool choice)Good working knowledge cloud based servicesOpen roles LinkedInYahooFord Motor Company

heading: Data Engineer
text: Summary roleA data engineer mainly focuses organizing data companies’ analytical tasks. Data Engineer often charge constructing data pipelines combine data various source systems. prepare data use analytics applications integrating, consolidating, cleaning ; improving organization’s big data environment making data easily accessible.quantity data data engineer uses depends organization, especially terms size. analytics architecture increasingly complicated engineer charge data organization gets bigger. Data-intensive industries include healthcare, retail, financial services etc.SalaryFrom 0 – 1 years experience, total pay ranges $82k $187k per year. estimated total pay data engineer $114,993 per year United States, average salary $89,540 per year plus $25,452/yr additional pay. Additional pay include cash bonus, commission, tips, profit sharing.Skills requiredSome primary functions data engineer include things like developing data collection processes, integrating new software data management technologies existing system streamlining existing foundational processes data collection use. Therefore, requires:Programming least one language (Python, Java, SAS, R, MatLab, C, C++, etc.)Data warehousing: familiarity experience using data warehousing solutions.Knowledge operating systems: intimate understanding operating systems, : Apple macOS, Microsoft Windows, Linux, Solaris UNIXDatabase systems: deep understanding database management, SQL considered widely used solutionOpen roles LinkedInAWSPwC
